title: anrE nAn sonnadu tannE
sahitya:
anrE nAn sonnadu tAnnE idil atishayam illaiyE mAnE


anupallavi

  onrai nI kELaDi mAnE idai Urariya sholluvEnE enru nAm peNNenru 
pEr koNDa nALO anrE nAm kaNNarkku aDimai aDimai aDimai aDimai


caraNam    Unum urakkamum pOccE inda Urengilum idE pOccE nANamum 
accamum pOccE rAsa nATTiyam Adavum AccE vENumenru gAnam pADum
vENugAna lOlan enna vidaikkAra kaLLanODi illai illai illai enru
